tutorial.speak:
Let's set up check-in for your church. First, you'll need to create a Chums account if you don't already have one. Click on Get Started.
Fill out your church's information in the registration form.
After clicking Register, check your email and click on Set Password.
Create a secure password for your account.
Click Sign In, and you'll be prompted to search for your church.
If your church isn't found, click on Register a New Church.
Confirm that you want to register a new church by selecting OK.
Fill in your church's information, leaving the subdomain as is.
You'll now be logged into your Chums account.
First, we need to add all the people who will be checking in. Search for who you'd like to add.
If they're not in the system, enter their first and last name and click ADD.
Click on the edit pencil to edit that person's information.
Enter as much detail as you have, including adding family members by clicking the edit pencil in the household section, then click SAVE.
Click on the add person icon to add as many family members as needed.
Next, click on the attendance icon.
Click on the plus icon to add a campus.
Click on Add Campus and name your campus.
Click on Add Service.
Name your service.
Click on Add Service time.
Add the time of your service or services.
Next, click on groups.
Click on the plus sign to add a new group.
Add as many groups as your church needs. To create multiple groups within the same category, enter the category name followed by the group name.
Click on the name of the group you'd like to set up for check-in, then click the edit button.
Click the edit pencil to edit the details of this group.
Set each group according to what you want to happen at check-in. If you want to track attendance, make sure to select Yes. Parent pickup means that when check-in happens on the app, it will print a kid tag and parent tag for that group.
The final step is to select the times you set up in the attendance step. Simply choose a time and click Add to include it.
